movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.plot: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

movies.title: The Godfather Part II
movies.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies.title: 12 Angry Men
movies.plot: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movies.plot: A bounty-hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.plot: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movies.title: Inception
movies.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies.plot: After the Empire overpowers the Rebel Alliance, Luke Skywalker begins training with Jedi Master Yoda, while Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett pursue his friends across the galaxy.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.plot: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

movies.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
movies.plot: A rebellious convict is sent to a psychiatric hospital for evaluation in 1963 Oregon, and encourages his docile companions to take more control of their lives and defy the tyrannical head nurse.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies.title: It's a Wonderful Life
movies.plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman see the value of his own life.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

movies.title: Seven Samurai
movies.plot: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, and he gathers six other samurai to join him.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose comrades have been killed in action.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.plot: A death row guard learns that a gentle giant in his charge possesses a mysterious gift.

shows.title: Breaking Bad
shows.plot: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student to secure his family's future.

shows.title: Planet Earth II
shows.plot: David Attenborough returns with a new wildlife documentary that shows life in a variety of habitats.

shows.title: Planet Earth
shows.plot: A documentary series on the wildlife found on Earth. Each episode covers a different habitat: deserts, mountains, deep oceans, shallow seas, forests, caves, polar regions, fresh water, plains and jungles. Narrated by David Attenborough.

shows.title: Band of Brothers
shows.plot: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

shows.title: Chernobyl
shows.plot: In April 1986, the city of Chernobyl in the Soviet Union suffers one of the worst nuclear disasters in the history of mankind. Consequently, many heroes put their lives on the line in the following days, weeks and months.

shows.title: The Wire
shows.plot: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

shows.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
shows.plot: In a war-torn world of elemental powers, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, and bring peace to the world.

shows.title: The Sopranos
shows.plot: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

shows.title: Blue Planet II
shows.plot: David Attenborough returns to the world's oceans in this sequel to the acclaimed documentary filming rare and unusual creatures of the deep, as well as documenting the problems our oceans face.

shows.title: Cosmos: A Spacetime Odyssey
shows.plot: An exploration of our discovery of the laws of nature and coordinates in space and time.

shows.title: Cosmos
shows.plot: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.

shows.title: Our Planet
shows.plot: Explores and unravels the mystery of how and why animals migrate, showing some of the most dramatic and compelling stories in the natural world through spectacular and innovative cinematography.

shows.title: Game of Thrones
shows.plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

shows.title: Bluey
shows.plot: The slice-of-life adventures of an Australian Blue Heeler Cattle Dog puppy as she has fun with her family and friends in everyday situations.

shows.title: The World at War
shows.plot: A groundbreaking 26-part documentary series narrated by the actor Laurence Olivier about the deadliest conflict in history, World War II.

shows.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
shows.plot: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

shows.title: Life
shows.plot: A global view of the specialized strategies and extreme behavior that living things have developed in order to survive; what Charles Darwin termed "the struggle for existence."

shows.title: Attack on Titan
shows.plot: After his hometown is destroyed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

shows.title: The Last Dance
shows.plot: Led by Michael Jordan, the 1990s Chicago Bulls establish themselves as one of the most notable dynasties in sports history.

shows.title: Rick and Morty
shows.plot: The fractured domestic lives of a nihilistic mad scientist and his anxious grandson are further complicated by their inter-dimensional misadventures.

shows.title: The Twilight Zone
shows.plot: Classic American Anthology series created by Rod Serling, featuring standalone stories of science fiction, fantasy, and horror, each with a twist ending or moral lesson.

shows.title: The Vietnam War
shows.plot: A comprehensive history of the United States' involvement in the bitterly divisive armed conflict in Southeast Asia.

shows.title: Sherlock
shows.plot: The quirky spin on Conan Doyle's iconic sleuth pitches him as a "high-functioning sociopath" in modern-day London. Assisting him in his investigations: Afghanistan War vet John Watson, who's introduced to Holmes by a mutual acquaintance.

shows.title: Batman: The Animated Series
shows.plot: Billionaire Bruce Wayne secretly operates as Batman, a vigilante who battles a rouges' gallery of criminals and supervillains in Gotham City with the aid of various sidekicks and allies.

shows.title: Better Call Saul
shows.plot: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the years leading up to his fateful run-in with Walter White and Jesse Pinkman.
